attributes.action: call for the immediate resignation of Peter Hain as MP for Neath.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We, as the residents of Neath Port Talbot, ask the prime minister of the UK government to call for the immediate resignation of Mr Peter Hain as MP for Neath. Mr Hain has shown himself totally unfit for public office. 

The people of Neath Port Talbot have been let down by Mr Hain time and time again.

He has forgotten his constituents in the recent fiasco.

We want someone who cares about the people of Neath Port Talbot.

Mr Hain has brought shame not only upon himself but also the people he was intended to represent.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
